basics.name: Qi Cui
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: A developer focused on full-stack development, system engineering, and machine learning.

work.name: Tencent
work.summary: Worked with the PaaS Platform Infrastructure Development Team on developing of BlueKing, a comprehensive DevOps solution.

work.name: NeuRRo Lab, UofM
work.summary: Contributed to a project that developed robotics software, enhancing shoulder rehabilitation by enabling precise robot control for patient therapy.

work.name: ASSET Lab, UofM
work.summary: Developed advanced predictive models to accurately forecast national electricity demand.

volunteer.summary: Twice served as a grader for Math 217, Linear Algebra, a crucial course for math, stats, and CS students.
Served as an academic peer advisor, designing logistics for the New Student Orientation to welcome over 5,000 incoming first-year students in the College of LSA.
